DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to prove the non-inferiority of Rifamycin SV-MMX® versus Ciprofloxacin for the treatment of adults with traveller's diarrhoea.
DOC.brief_title: Rifamycin SV-MMX® Tablets Versus Ciprofloxacin Capsules in Acute Traveller's Diarrhoea
DOC.criteria: Informed consent, Signs or symptoms of indication of acute bacterial diarrhea (traveller's diarrhea) Fever, Grossly bloody stool, Females pregnant or breast feeding, Participation in an other clinical trial
